page.title: 04COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content:
{Police: This area does not demand much attention because it is a small quiet area with little trouble. The last incident was a year ago on the 14 July 1984,when a bugulary/theft on a house occured. There is a daily patrol controlled from the Divisional section at Yeovil. The nearest poiice staition is at Somerton.
{Education: There are no schools in this area,but there are Primary schools in High Ham, Compton Dundon, and Somerton; Secondary schools and Sixth Form Colleges at Yeovil, Taunton, Street. Some children went to Millfield School,and Brymore.
